channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Benin's interior minister says a coup announced earlier has been foiled
item.description: Earlier, a group of soldiers had appeared on Benin 's state TV Sunday to announce the dissolution of the government in an apparent coup, the latest of...

item.title: A ban on feeding pigeons ruffles lots of feathers in Mumbai
item.description: The pigeon population has exploded — a result of people feeding the birds. For some it's a holy duty and a way to connect to nature. Critics point to ...

item.title: McLaren's Lando Norris wins first F1 title at season-ending Abu Dhabi Grand Prix
item.description: Red Bull driver and defending champion Max Verstappen won the race with Norris placing third, which allowed Norris to finish two points ahead of Verst...

item.title: A fire at a popular nightclub in India's Goa state kills at least 25, officials say
item.description: At least 25 people, including tourists, were killed in a fire at a popular nightclub in India's Goa state, the state's chief minister said Sunday.

item.title: From 400-year-old globes to cosmic shrouds: A Maine library brings maps to life
item.description: From 400-year-old globes to cosmic funeral shrouds, how the Osher Map Library in Maine shows people that maps aren't just for navigation — but windows...

item.title: Nightclub fire in India's Goa kills 25 staff and tourists
item.description: Eyewitnesses described scenes of panic in one of Goa's bustling nightlife areas.

item.title: This week on "Sunday Morning" (Dec. 7)
item.description: A look at the features for this week's broadcast of the Emmy-winning program, hosted by Jane Pauley.

item.title: Ethan Hawke on "Blue Moon," and taking nothing for granted

item.title: Book excerpt: "My Beloved" by Jan Karon
item.description: The New York Times bestselling author returns to the village of Mitford in her 15th novel featuring Father Tim Kavanagh.

item.title: Benin coup attempt foiled by loyalist troops, interior minister says
item.description: A presidential adviser tells the BBC that President Patrice Talon is in a safe location.

item.title: New US security strategy aligns with Russia's vision, Moscow says
item.description: The Kremlin welcomes the starkly worded document, which does not cast Russia as a threat to the US.

item.title: Katy Perry goes Instagram official with Justin Trudeau
item.description: The pop star posted a string of photographs of herself and the former Canadian Prime Minster.

item.title: Chernobyl radiation shield 'lost safety function' after drone strike, UN watchdog says
item.description: The protective shield at the site of the 1986 disaster has lost its main safety function, the IAEA says.

item.title: Magnitude-7.0 earthquake hits in remote wilderness along Alaska-Canada border
Sheriff hunting for the last of 3 inmates who escaped from a Louisiana jail
Man wounded in 2nd stabbing attack on North Carolina commuter train since August
item.description: Police in North Carolina have charged a 33-year-old man with stabbing someone on a commuter train in Charlotte.
